name: Ritual Bound
description:
Story: 

You've been enrolled in the Ritual Academy. This is the place where you can learn about how magic works. The head of the school wants to make sure that the students are very serious about their studies and has them embark on a journey after the opening ceremony. 

The Head of the school has urged for new students to venture out with a few other classmates. This gives the students the chance to learn from how each other approaches arranging and casting Rituals.

How to Play:   Objective:

The objective of this game is to be the first one to the end. Whoever gets to the end first will have their Ritual (Song) performed (played) at the beginning of the game. The ultimate bragging right! 

Movement:

When it is your turn you can either click onto the dice block to roll, or use space bar.

Board Spots:

There are a few different spots you can land on.

  • Normal Spot
    • Landing on this spot will give you the Rune (Musical Note) you landed on
  • Happy Face Spot
    • Landing on this spot will give +1 bonus Rune (Random Musical Note)
  • Chest Spot
    • When you land on this spot it will prompt the Chest Mini Game (Chance to win up to 2 bonus Runes)
  • Large Spot
    • When you land on this spot it will stop your movement and begin Ritual Mode
    • The last Large Spot will end the Game
Ritual Mode:

When you first go into Ritual mode, you'll see the Runes you've collected drop. Drag your drop your Runes into the empty circles (If you let go close enough, they will snap into place).

You can practice your Ritual by clicking on the Practice Button. 

Once you've pressed the Cast Spell Button, it will perform your arrangement and transition into the next players turn.

Chest Mini-Game:

When landing on the Chest spot, it prompts the Mini-Game. 

Click (or Space Bar) on the spell book when you see the Rune fly across the screen. You want it to get closest to the center. This will cast your Ritual Magic to unlock the Chest you are trying to loot.

Possible Outcomes:

  • No Bonus Rune
  • 1 Bonus Rune (random note)
  • 2 Bonus Runes (random notes)

Please Note: You'll still receive your base rune for landing on a spot.
